title: Amazing ambience
text:
the is truly a standout property I have ever been to . the staff is so attentive, the food is really nice. the d√©cor the out of the world . loved this place. it was a good choice for us. will visit the milestone soon whenever in London.
Room Tip: city view from the top floor See more room tips Green Features: it is kind of a green hotel which I have heard but didn't actually noticed anything.
